11000000000000010000000000000000 --0 PC = 0 +      RJMP
11000000000000100000000000000010 --1 PC = 2 + 3    RJMP
11000000000000010000000000000101 --2 PC = 5 + 2    RJMP
11000000000010010000000000000111 --3 PC = 7 + 10   RJMP
11000000000000100000000000010001 --4 PC = 17 + 3   RJMP
10010100000010010000000000010100 --5 PC = Z        IJMP
11010000000000011000000000000000 --6 PC = 12123123123 RCALL
10010101000010010000000000000000 --7 ICALL
10010101000010000000000000000000 --8 RET
10010101000110000000000000000000 --9 RETI
11111100000000000000000000000001  --10 
11111110000000000000000000000010  --11
11000000000000010000000000000000
